chart.title: Active Services by Groups
chart.searchTemplate: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | eval group_list=mvjoin(service_groups,",") | stats latest(group_list) as Groups by service_uuid | stats count as Active by Groups

chart.title: Traffic Volume by Service Groups
chart.searchTemplate: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | eval Groups=mvjoin(service_groups,",") | stats sum(down_gb) as Down sum(up_gb) as Up by Groups | eval GB=Up+Down | fields Groups,GB

chart.title: Traffic Volume by Service
chart.searchTemplate: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | stats latest(service_ssid) as service_ssid sum(down_gb) as Down sum(up_gb) as Up by service_uuid | eval GB=Up+Down | eval Service=service_ssid." (".service_uuid.")" | sort - GB | fields Service,GB

table.searchTemplate: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow | eval Service=service_uuid | stats latest(service_ssid) as SSID latest(service_local_radios) as "Local Radios" latest(service_auth) as auth sum(eval(exact(up_bytes/(1024*1024*1024)))) as up_gb sum(eval(exact(down_bytes/(1024*1024*1024)))) as down_gb sum(timeendpos) as seconds by Service | eval total_gb=up_gb+down_gb | eval Down=round(down_gb,2) . " GB" | eval Up=round(up_gb,2) . " GB" | eval Duration=tostring(seconds, "duration") | eval Authentication=case(auth=="open","Open",auth=="psk","Personal",auth=="eap","Enterprise") | sort - total_gb | fields Service,SSID,"Local Radios",Authentication,Up,Down,Duration

search.query: * sourcetype=anyfi_flow AND service_uuid=$service_uuid$ | stats values(radio_hwaddr) as Radio sum(up_mb) as sum_up_mb sum(down_mb) as sum_down_mb sum(timeendpos) as seconds avg(avg_signal_dbm) as avg_signal min(min_signal_dbm) as min_signal max(max_signal_dbm) as max_signal sum(down_pkts) as sum_down_pkts sum(up_pkts) as sum_up_pkts sum(down_lost_pkts) as sum_down_lost_pkts sum(up_lost_pkts) as sum_up_lost_pkts count(eval(state="tunnel_error")) as "Tunnel Errors" count(eval(state="auth_error")) as "Auth Errors" by radio_hwaddr | eval Down=round(sum_down_mb,1) . " MB" | eval total_mb=sum_up_mb + sum_down_mb | eval Up=round(sum_up_mb,1) . " MB" | eval Duration=tostring(seconds, "duration") | eval Best=max_signal . " dBm" | eval Worst=min_signal . " dBm" | eval Average=round(avg_signal,1) . " dBm" | eval "Packet Loss"=round((sum_up_lost_pkts + sum_down_lost_pkts) / (sum_up_pkts + sum_down_pkts), 2) . "%" | sort - total_mb | fields Radio, Up, Down, Duration, Best, Worst, Average, "Packet Loss", "Tunnel Errors", "Auth Errors"
